name: Nilou
desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring

value.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
value.desc:
"The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" Nilou

Seven heavens, passing like a radiant stream, as though a dream drawn into being.

value.text: Reward for inviting Nilou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Nilou
value.desc: The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I'll do my best. Let's both enjoy ourselves!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Nilou's deck is built around using "Nilou"'s Golden Chalice's Bounty, and she will activate its special Bloom reaction to deal serious DMG.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc:
"Burgeoning Grace" Yaoyao

An adeptal constitution.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc:
Golden Vow: Candace

The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
customize.desc:
"The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" Nilou

Seven heavens, passing like a radiant stream, as though a dream drawn into being.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"This is amazing... Playing these games reminds me of learning new dance steps. I think I've found my rhythm!"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Nilou" starts with the Talent Card "The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" equipped.</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , if the party includes <color=#80c0ff>Hydro Characters</color> and <color=#99ff88>Dendro Characters</color> and characters from no other Elements, create 1 <color=#ffffff>Golden Chalice's Bounty</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Golden Chalice's Bounty</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After opponent's characters are affected by the Bloom reaction:</color> Your team no longer generates <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> , but instead summons <color=#ffffff>Bountiful Cores</color> .

talent.key: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
talent.title: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . The target character and the next character receives Lingering Aeon .
<color=#ece5d8>Lingering Aeon</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to affected character.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When you declare the end of your Round:</color> If this summon has at least 2 Usages remaining, deal 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . (Consumes <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> )
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, Max 3 stacks.)

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro/Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
